sentence.Network_en: I hope the graphs on the following pages are self-explanatory.
sentence.Network_cn: 我希望后面几页的图表能一目了然。

sentence.Network_en: These statements are accompanied by a series of explanatory notes.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些陈述后面有一系列解释性注释。

sentence.Network_en: There are explanatory notes at the back of the book.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from late Latin explanatorius, from Latin explanare (see explain)

entry.def: Explanatory statements or theories are intended to make people understand something by describing it or giving the reasons for it.

example.ex: These statements are accompanied by a series of explanatory notes...
example.tran: 这些陈述后面有一系列解释性注释。

example.ex: The concept was later seen to have explanatory power.
example.tran: 这一概念其后被认为具有阐释力。

means.word_mean: 1. serving or intended to explain or make clear;

auth_sentence.content: He rendered himself as explanatory as he could.
auth_sentence.res_content: He rendered himself as explanatory as he could.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He rendered himself as explanatory as he could.

auth_sentence.content: They are falsifiable, explanatory, and predictive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are falsifiable, explanatory, and predictive.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"场所,地点"; 2. 表形容词,"有……性质的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: condemn谴责+atory有……性质的→adj.非难的,处罚的
exclam=exclaim叫喊+atory有……性质的→adj.叫喊的,感叹的,惊叹的
explan=explain解释,说明+atory有……性质的→adj.解释[性]的,说明的
mand命令+atory有……性质的→adj.命令的,强迫的
oblige迫使,责成+atory有……性质的→adj.强制性的,义务的
propiti=propitiate讨好+atory有……性质的→adj.讨好的,调解的
conserve保存,保全+atory场所,地点→n.温室,音乐学院
labor劳动+atory场所,地点→劳动的地方→实验室
lav洗,冲+atory场所→冲洗的地方→洗手间
observe观察+atory场所,地点→用来观察的场所
purg纯洁+atory场所,地点→炼狱是人们净化灵魂之地

means.word_mean: 解释的, 说明的,阐述的

sentences.en: There are some explanatory notes at the end of the chapter.
sentences.cn: 这一章的结尾有一些注解。

sentences.en: See explanatory notes at the foot of this page.
